tool_description: Compares words across multiple languages to identify cognates, borrowings, and shared etymological origins with similarity analysis.

primary_word.description: The primary word to compare against other languages

primary_language.description: ISO 639-1 code of the primary word's language

comparison_languages.description: Array of ISO 639-1 language codes to compare against

semantic_field.description: Semantic category to focus comparison: kinship, colors, numbers, body_parts, animals, food, tools, nature

include_borrowings.description: Whether to include borrowed words in comparison results

historical_period.description: Historical period to focus on: ancient, medieval, early_modern, modern

error_messages: Invalid primary language: Provide a valid ISO 639-1 language code for primary_language.
Invalid comparison languages: All language codes in comparison_languages must be valid ISO 639-1 codes.
Primary word not found: The primary word could not be found in the specified language.
Semantic field not recognized: Use one of [kinship, colors, numbers, body_parts, animals, food, tools, nature].
Similarity threshold out of range: Set minimum_similarity between 0 and 1.
Historical period not recognized: Use one of [ancient, medieval, early_modern, modern].
Too many comparison languages: Limit comparison_languages to 50 entries maximum.
usage: Provide primary_word, primary_language, and comparison_languages array. Optionally filter by semantic_field, set include_borrowings, minimum_similarity threshold, and historical_period.

cognate_matches.description: Array of cognate words found in comparison languages

similarity_scores.description: Phonetic similarity scores corresponding to each cognate match

relationship_types.description: Type of relationship for each match: cognate, borrowing, calque, false_friend

languages_found.description: Language codes where cognates were found
